Posts.Content: Hello, Ive read a lot of the responces & many have good advice. It is important to detox chemicals out of your body as well as build your Immune system. Eating healthier and staying away frm sugar, incl processed as well as red meats, if you can stick to 'good fish' & some organis chicken as your meats that'll help. a low protein and nuetral body is also important. I would highly reccommend Immunocal & it's Platinum version as well, it meets all these criteria. It's completely natural and many of my friends are survivors of Cancer as well as many other sicknesses because of it. contact me & I can help you get it t a drastic discount for this month & next. read about it on my website  www.Immunotec.com/DianaStroup.prod you can contact me thru there as well Im on facebook as well with many video's too you can even search Immunocal & Cancer @ www.pubmed.gov   or youtube for other personal testimonials you can beat this don't give up
